text:
Hi community,
“This update absolutely needed to do the resizing automatically, assuming the
recovery partition is in the proper position to be able to shrink the OS
partition to make room.” 
Practically, yes. It cannot expand. Windows itself still does not support
partition movement like any other simple tool out there. 
The winRE partition is at the end of the disk for this very a reason. And from
there Setup would eventually delete this, shrink the partition before that and
add a new one. 
As it is at the end of the drive for the reason, we can only shrink like back in
the 90’s, it will not be able to expand to anywhere. 
Best regards, 
Karl Wester-Ebbinghaus 
Senior IT Consultant 
Von:  <
%248f4b86f0%24ade294d0%24%40chynet.de

metadata.subject: WG: [patchmanagement] Feedback to Microsoft
metadata.email_text_original:
Sie erhalten nicht oft eine E-Mail von mailtome@chynet.de. Erfahren Sie, warum
dies wichtig ist [https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification]
